subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Women)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: A 6-foot-4 sophomore with a 7-1 wingspan, Connecticut’s Breanna Stewart is widely considered the best college player in women’s basketball: a tall forward with the deft skills of a guard.
snippet: A 6-foot-4 sophomore with a 7-1 wingspan, Connecticut’s Breanna Stewart is widely considered the best college player in women’s basketball: a tall forward with the deft skills of a guard.
